com.ayvytr.adapter

类 SmartAdapter<T>

  • com.ayvytr.adapter.SmartAdapter<T>

  • public class SmartAdapter<T>

    Real adapter class, return type of SmartAdapterKt.bind. You can inherit class SmartAdapter, but in most situations, call SmartAdapterKt.bind is enough.

    另请参阅:
    SmartAdapterKt.bind, class SmartAdapter, SmartAdapterKt.bind

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      SmartAdapter(java.util.List<T> list, android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView rv)
      Real adapter class, return type of SmartAdapterKt.bind. You can inherit class SmartAdapter, but in most situations, call SmartAdapterKt.bind is enough.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SmartAdapter

        public SmartAdapter(java.util.List<T> list,
                    android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView rv)

        Real adapter class, return type of SmartAdapterKt.bind. You can inherit class SmartAdapter, but in most situations, call SmartAdapterKt.bind is enough.

        另请参阅:
        SmartAdapterKt.bind, class SmartAdapter, SmartAdapterKt.bind

      • map

        public SmartAdapter<T> map(SmartContainer<T> smartContainer)

        Multiple item view type creator, if you call this explicit, you must to call SmartAdapter.type to describe how to get item view type.

        另请参阅:
        SmartAdapter.type
